import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { GlobalState } from "../../GlobalState"; import "../adminpage/features/userdetail/userdetail.css"; import dateFormat from "dateformat"; import { AccountCircle, PermIdentity, Settings } from "@material-ui/icons"; function Infor() { const state = useContext(GlobalState); const [infor] = state.userApi.infor; return (

Your Profile

{infor.email} {infor.name}
Account Detail
Name: {infor.name}
Phone: {infor.phone}
Address: {infor.address}
Role: {infor.role === 0 ? "User Account" : "Admin Account"}
Date join: {dateFormat(infor.createdAt)}
Last update: {dateFormat(infor.updatedAt)}
Edit Information
); } export default Infor;
